## SubscriptionController.(constructor)

Creates a new SubscriptionController.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(effect: Effect);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  effect | [Effect](./reactive.effect.md) | The effect that should be executed whenever a tracked reference was changed. |
